thread.title: Ivanka Invites Russian Billionaire’s Wife To Inauguration Weekend
thread.title_full: Ivanka Invites Russian Billionaire’s Wife To Inauguration Weekend

author: Katie Frates
title: Ivanka Invites Russian Billionaire’s Wife To Inauguration Weekend
text:
Dasha Zhukova Credit: REUETRS/Sergei Karpukhin 5433215 
Ivanka Trump invited an interesting guest to attend inauguration weekend festivities. 
Dasha Zhukova, 35, the wife of one of Russian President Vladimir Putin’s close friends, will be in attendance, according to Politico . 
Zhukova gave former Democratic nominee Hillary Clinton ‘s campaign $2,700 in 2015. 
Her husband, Roman Abramovich, 50, is one of the richest men in Russia . He’s involved with companies Evraz, Norilsk Nickel and the Chelsea soccer team. According to Forbes, his net worth is $8.5 billion. 
The couple has homes in New York City and Colorado.
